body:
Comment 6: 
> of course, the simplest thing to do is just create gopath in $GOROOT (or $GOROOT/misc)
and modify make.bash (make.bat, make.rc) to build it when it's there.

I haven't tried this, but what about checking out/moving the go.tools source into

$GOROOT/src/code.google.com/p/...

Then go install -a std will build and test the additional commands as part of the 2nd
stage of the build.

^ note, not tested, but this is how it used to work way back in the old days.
